page.title: 11RECREATION IN WATCHET
page.content: {RECREATION IN WATCHET}- is very good bowls,cricket,football,darts,skittles, snooker,keep fit,majorettes etc. There is a{Leisure Centre}which has{sports,} keep fit, discos and lots of other fun things. Many{indoor hobbies}are held in Watchet clubs and pubs, there is a {Memorial Ground}for football and cricket. For children there is also Cubs, Brownies, Sea Scouts and Guides. { {BROWNIES}- At Brownies we play games,sing songs and lots of other things that are fun.The uniform is brown with a yellow tie.When you join brownies you go into a six.They are named after different types of fairies We do concerts and go into the carnival, we also win badges. You have to be 7 years old and you leave at 10 years old to join the Guides.
